
l_glyph_getLabel Get Glyph Label

#### Description 

Returns the label of a glyph

#### Usage
<pre><code>

l_glyph_getLabel(widget, id)

</code></pre>
#### Arguments 

* ``widget``: widget path as a string or as an object handle
* ``id ``:   glyph id
See Also
l_glyph_add, l_glyph_ids, l_glyph_relabel
